attributes.action: Obligate a training course to all SIA registered Doorstaff in the United Kingdom to give them approved skills necessary to use on the front line and to afford them with similar rights and protection as the Police,.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following a tragic accident involving a member of the public and a highly valued member of doorstaff, we are petitioning the Prime Minister to obligate all doorstaff to undergo similar training to that of the Police to give all Frontline Operatives the same level of skill, techniques, and similar levels of protection, both physically and legally to those of the Police they help.

We are asking this to "weed out" the bad doorstaff who cannot use force reasonably, and also to show any Court or Jury that techniques used in any situation are along Home Office guidelines and safe. This will also bring ALL UK doorstaff to a level service standard.

If Doorstaff follow the approved techniques and guidelines, this may be used as a defence should an unfortunate accident occur. 

Doorstaff accross the world are committed to ensuring that the public have a safe night out, and to stop troublemakers from causing themselves or other people harm. When accidents happen, Doorstaff are usually shown in such a bad light which damages the reputation of doorstaff allover.

THIS MUST STOP NOW WITH THE STANDARDISATION OF ALL DOORSTAFF TRAINING IN THE UK
